definitions.title: mark of accus.
definitions.body: (= BH I. [[אֵת]]; Palm. [[ית]]; Zinj.:Had. 28 c. sf. [[ותה]]; Nab. Palm. c. sf. [[יתה]] (Lzb:263 Cooke:170; cf. REvS:468); Targum Sam. [[יָת]]; Syr. yot (rare); v. further p. 84 b);—Da 3:12 [[דִּי מַנִּיתָ]] [[יָֽתְהוֹן]] whom thou hast appointed.
